channel.title: ctf on My blog
channel.description: Recent content in ctf on My blog

item.title: What is TOCTOU
item.description: TOCTOU mean Time-of-Check to Time-of-Use. It’s a bug were it involve checking the state of the system and using the result Example if (access("file", W_OK) != 0) { exit(1); } fd = open("file", O_WRONLY); write(fd, buffer, sizeof(buffer)); Here an attacker can create a symlink after the access but before the open call, resulting in a malicious file to be open. Synonyms TOCTTOU TOC/TOU Source wikipedia

item.title: What is Ctf
item.description: CTF stand for Capture The Flag(s). It’s a type of game/exercise were you, the player need to find the flag. The flag is generally a string, but it can represented in other way.

item.title: Snowcrash
item.description: Introduction Snowcrash is a VM in the style of a CTF. You have 14 level to complete and get each flags Summary Level00: You lost something ? Level01: John, can you give me the flag ? Level02: I want a soda with my shark. Level03: Echo from the past. Level04: I found a Perl. Level05: A fight in the arena. Level06: Replace the elephant. Level07: You can’t log me. Level08: Can you read a link ?
